name: @thecointech/scraper-agent
description: TheCoin: AI Agent to automate the creation of scraping recorder scripts
author: Stephen Taylor <stephen@thecoin.io>

scripts.autoRecord: yarn run -T cross-env CONFIG_NAME=devlive URL_SEQ_LOGGING=false TC_LOG_FOLDER=./logs run-env tools/recordSamples/autoRecord.ts
scripts.autoRecord:prod: yarn run -T cross-env CONFIG_NAME=prodtest URL_SEQ_LOGGING=false TC_LOG_FOLDER=./logs run-env tools/recordSamples/autoRecord.ts
scripts.replay: yarn run -T cross-env CONFIG_NAME=devlive URL_SEQ_LOGGING=false TC_LOG_FOLDER=./logs run-env tools/replay/replay.ts
scripts.replay:prod: yarn run -T cross-env CONFIG_NAME=prodtest URL_SEQ_LOGGING=false TC_LOG_FOLDER=./logs run-env tools/replay/replay.ts
